Name: Eastern Promise
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Citrus dominates this drink but the result is floral rather than tart.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2004 at Oxo Tower Bar , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Eastern Promise contains 190 calories
